item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 15, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Unsure Calculator – back-of-a-napkin probabilistic calculator (127 points | 26 comments)
2. Clolog (160 points | 22 comments)
3. Generate videos in Gemini and Whisk with Veo 2 (175 points | 75 comments)
4. Cursor IDE support hallucinates lockout policy, causes mass user cancellations (255 points | 69 comments)
5. Liquid: Language models are scalable and unified multi-modal generators (35 points | 3 comments)
6. Launch HN: mrge.io (YC X25) – Cursor for code review (152 points | 80 comments)
7. Mitre-backed cyber vulnerability program to lose funding (6 points | discuss)
8. What the hell is a target triple? (114 points | 81 comments)
9. The case of the UI thread that hung in a kernel call (76 points | 19 comments)
10. 4chan Sharty Hack And Janitor Email Leak (360 points | 435 comments)

12. OpenAI is building a social network? (48 points | 38 comments)
13. METS, the Middle English Texts Series (35 points | discuss)
14. Teuken-7B-Base and Teuken-7B-Instruct: Towards European LLMs (232 points | 86 comments)
15. How the U.S. became a science superpower (193 points | 177 comments)

17. Cohere Launches Embed 4 (76 points | 39 comments)
18. Post-Silicon Validation of Static Lockstep Mode (29 points | 2 comments)

20. Amazfit activity tracker and watch face asset generation (11 points | 1 comment)
21. It's easier than ever to de-censor videos (294 points | 123 comments)
22. Hacking the Postgres wire protocol (137 points | 29 comments)
23. Fun ways of deciding authorship order (55 points | 27 comments)
24. How many supernova explode every year? (344 points | 167 comments)
25. A flowing WebGL gradient, deconstructed (9 points | discuss)
26. How to win an argument with a toddler (519 points | 392 comments)
27. MeshCore, a new lightweight, hybrid routing mesh protocol for packet radios (78 points | 28 comments)
28. The Whimsical Investor (78 points | 10 comments)
29. Modern CMake (48 points | 31 comments)
30. Show HN: Resonate – real-time high temporal resolution spectral analysis (51 points | 16 comments)
